answers.answer: Nooooooooo don't take that at least my doctor adviced me not 2. I've had migranes sense high school and I was on very strong medication for them. Right now I don't take them but I do try, to sleep, eat and drink more water it helps me.
Okay I didn't think I could:( I have been drinking atleast a gallon of water a day there's no way I could make myself drink more. This is just horrible!
My doc adviced me to drink some caffeine and if nothing else works you should talk to your doc to rule out preeclampsia
Is your blood pressure good ? Someone if its high it can cause really bad migraines/headaches
Same thing hrre they got better with the pregnancy but now at the end I'm getting them again and i drink lots of water!!!

question: I'm 37 weeks and I keep getting these horrible migraines:( iv always had them since I was little but when I got pregnant they got better and now there back! I don't have any Tylenol only ibruprophin..would it be ok if I took some?
title: Migraines
